title: Curry sprains left ankle in Warriors' loss
description: Warriors guard Stephen Curry injures ankle, attempts to return, and then exits for good with 7:55 remaining in the fourth.

title: 5 Takeaways: Maxey, Drummond level up in 76ers win
description: Tyrese Maxey fills it up, Andre Drummond steps in and Indiana encounters weaknesses in a loss to Philadelphia.

title: Heat unveil Wade statue at Miami's Kaseya Center
description: Dwyane Wade, one of six former Heat players to have their number retired by the team, becomes the 1st with a statue.

title: Durant becomes 8th player to reach 29,000 points
description: Durant joins an exclusive club with LeBron James, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar, Karl Malone, Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan, Dirk Nowitzki and Wilt Chamberlain.

title: 5 Takeaways: Durant hits 29K points, Suns top Mavs
description: Kevin Durant makes more history, the Mavericks encounter more resistance and the Suns experiment with some younger depth.

title: Redick spotted watching game film in car wash
description: 'Very efficient use of time,' said Redick in reponse to former NBA point guard Baron Davis' social media post.

title: This Week in NBA History: Legends debut
description: Dozens of future All-Stars make their NBA debuts and Klay Thompson hits 14 3-pointers to set the single-game record in 2018.

title: Saturday's NBA TV tripleheader full of star power
description: NBA TV’s Saturday tripleheader boasts two Western Conference duels featuring four former Kia NBA MVPs.

title: NBA players born on Nov. 3
description: With over 5,000 players in NBA history, at least one player was born on every day of the calendar year.

title: Starting 5, Oct. 26: AD sparks Lakers' rally
description: No rim is safe when the Greek Freak gets going.

title: 5 takeaways: Down 22, Davis rallies Lakers
description: The Lakers look like AD's team, JJ Redick appears ready for the job and the Suns' defense remains a work in progress.

title: 5 things to know: Rockets-Spurs (8:30 ET, League Pass)
description: Victor Wembanyama and the San Antonio Spurs take on Alperen Sengun's Rockets in an all-Texas matchup.
